API_Description: Represents the subject of the PDF document, typically used for categorizing or describing the content of the document.
API_Description_Reason: The property name 'ANSB_Subject' suggests it is related to the subject or topic of the document, which is a common metadata field in documents.
Returns: A string representing the subject of the document.
Returns_Reason: Since 'subject' is typically a text field in document metadata, it is reasonable to assume that this property returns a string.

type.description: The data type of the subject property, which is expected to be a string.
type.description_reason: The subject of a document is usually a textual description, hence it is likely to be a string.
type.type_reason: Document metadata fields like subject are generally represented as strings.
